SELECT a.course_id, a.course_name, a.course_desc, a.sort, a.use_on, a.del_on, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.create_manager, a.update_manager FROM pmp_course a WHERE a.del_on = 0
AND a.course_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyWord}, '%')
AND a.use_on = #{useOn,jdbcType=BIT}
ORDER BY a.sort, a.course_id
